name: 梦溪画坊 / DreamGallery
description:
"Dream Gallery" （梦溪画坊）is an ancient style puzzle game, we need to reorganize the fragments, one by one to reproduce the story in the painting, or sad, or happy enmity.

Take a bamboo raft to Mengxi Art Workshop, in the quiet scenery, explore the story in the painting.

Departure to Painting WorkshopHere the sun is shining, the fall is colorful, the water is rippling, the red-crowned crane paces leisurely on the stream, from time to time picking up a fish.The wind lifts your pendulum, follows its footsteps, and passes through the elegant hall, caressing the petals that fall on your shoulders.By the pond of dreams, you look at the fragments of the memory picture and fall into meditation.

Ancient eleganceWhether the chivalrous chivalrous warriors who are happy with their kindness and hatred, or the drunken concubines of the court, they can not help but feel trapped.Let these pictures of memory take you through the past and present, and read about kindness and enmity.

Heart of developmentBecause of our special interest in traditional Chinese cultural dress and landscape artistic conception, we want to develop a recreational game like Tao Yuanming's pastoral style of "gathering Chrysanthemum under the eastern fence and seeing Nanshan leisurely".Then it was accompanied by a group of photographers who took elaborate stories and photographs from all over the country.Hope that the beauty of the ancient style can be better presented to you.
